description: This table gives all the electronic refill information. The information covers details of ordered medications, who ordered them and from where they were ordered.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the order with which the e-refill is associated.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact (when the order was placed) in calendar format.

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_RX_NAM
columns.description: The name of the e-refill requested medication.

columns.name: EREFILL_MED_ID
columns.description: Stores the medication NDC code i.e national drug code which is associated with ERX (.1 medication ID number).

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_RX_QTY
columns.description: The quantity of the requested medication.

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_RX_UNIT
columns.description: Stores the units of the quantity of requested medication.

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_RX_SIG
columns.description: Stores the user signature for the requested e-refill.

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_RFL_NUM
columns.description: The number of refills requested in the e-refill.

columns.name: EREFILL_PHARM_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the requesting pharmacy

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_PERSON
columns.description: Stores the EMP ID of the person requesting the refill.

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_DT
columns.description: Stores the date and time the e-refill was requested.

columns.name: EREFILL_REQ_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the ID of the Note (HNO) record that stores the pharmacy comments.

columns.name: ERFLL_REQ_RFL_PRN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the As Needed (PRN) value for refills (for example PRN-2Yr or PRN-1Yr), referring to the length of time the 'as needed' medication can be refilled.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PRN-2Yr


PRN-1Yr


PRN-Other
